content.rendered:
Dr Biswas is a clinician and associate lecturer in health and medicine field. She joined Regent group as an associate lecturer in the School of Health and Social Sciences.
Her responsibilities are facilitating and assessing learning in the School of Health and Social Sciences. She is currently facilitating learning in the BSc (Hons) Health and social Care with Foundation Year degree franchised from the University of Bolton.

Research interests and publications

Arteriosclerosis, Thrombosis, and Vascular. Topic: Disturbed Flow Promotes Endothelial Senescence via a 53-Dependent Pathway
